name: Planet Mort
description:
As soon as you wake up, life does not wait and you start to struggle.
Choose to eat whatever you can find and stick with what you learn.



Stranded on Planet Mort you go through one single day trying to stay alive.
Every passing hour of that day breeds a new scenario with another problem to be solved.
Your sole goal is to avoid starvation, your status is indicated in the top right of the HUD.
To progress through the day, use mechanics such as running, jumping, diving, melee fighting and shooting.



Go through the planet's linear but open landscapes using the available minimaps built into the user interface. Trust your instincts navigating the simple movement and combat system, unveiling mysteries, encountering special enemies, and collecting hidden items on and around the planet. There are multiple minigames and secret areas waiting to be found.
The game supports manual saving and lets you create up to three save slots.
